function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of monitoring and disinfection of liquid waste","Impact":"Potential spread of viral infections through water sources","Mitigation":"Implement monitoring and constant disinfection of liquid waste","Technologies":"Advanced water treatment systems, UV disinfection, chlorination","People":"General public, individuals using water sources","Owner":"Local authorities, water management organizations"},{"Description":"Increased production of organic and inorganic waste","Impact":"Overloading of waste management systems and potential environmental pollution","Mitigation":"Implement waste reduction strategies and enhance waste management infrastructure","Technologies":"Waste-to-energy technologies, recycling and composting facilities","People":"Consumers, waste management organizations","Owner":"Local authorities, waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Suspension of recycling programs","Impact":"Reduction in recycling efforts and potential increase in landfill waste","Mitigation":"Implement safety measures in recycling centers and promote alternative recycling methods","Technologies":"Automated sorting systems, robotics in recycling, contactless recycling drop-off points","People":"Recycling center workers, general public","Owner":"Local authorities, recycling facilities"}]}
